directions: Cream together butter and sugar.  Mix in egg yolks, and then the spices.  Fold in the fruit and nuts.
In another bowl, beat egg whites until firm.  Fold into fruit and nut mixture.  Divide into two pie shells.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes.
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
title: Osgood Pie
